meanings.definition: The physical structure of a person or animal
meanings.sent1: Her body felt tired after a long day of playing outside.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the patient's body to check for any injuries.
meanings.sent3: The body of the teddy bear was filled with soft stuffing.
meanings.sent4: The body of the car was dented after the accident.
meanings.sent5: The body of the tree stood tall and strong in the forest.

meanings.definition: A group of people or things
meanings.sent1: The search party formed a body to look for the lost hiker.
meanings.sent2: The body of students gathered in the school auditorium for the assembly.
meanings.sent3: The body of volunteers worked together to clean up the park.
meanings.sent4: The body of evidence presented in court proved the defendant's guilt.
meanings.sent5: The body of protesters marched through the streets demanding change.

meanings.definition: The main or central part of something
meanings.sent1: The body of the essay should contain the main arguments.
meanings.sent2: The body of the machine houses the important components.
meanings.sent3: The body of the story revealed the unexpected twist.
meanings.sent4: The body of the song featured a catchy chorus.
meanings.sent5: The body of the presentation highlighted the key points.

meanings.definition: The main part of a book or document
meanings.sent1: The body of the novel described the protagonist's journey.
meanings.sent2: In the body of the report, you will find detailed analysis.
meanings.sent3: The body of the manual provided step-by-step instructions.
meanings.sent4: The body of the thesis explored new research findings.
meanings.sent5: The body of the textbook covered various topics in depth.

meanings.definition: A large amount or collection of something
meanings.sent1: She received a body of work to complete by the end of the week.
meanings.sent2: The library had a body of books on different subjects.
meanings.sent3: The body of water stretched out as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent4: The body of evidence supported the scientist's theory.
meanings.sent5: The body of knowledge in the field continues to expand.
